definitions.definition: One who abuses someone or something.
One who uses in an illegal or wrongful use.
definitions.dating_raw: Attested from the mid 17 century until the mid 18 century.

main_definition: One who abuses someone or something. [First attested around 1350 to 1470.]
secondary_definitions: ( obsolete ) One who uses in an illegal or wrongful use. [Attested from the mid 17 century until the mid 18 century.]
